item.description: Psychometric Principles in Student Assessment (Mislevy, et al. 2003) #phase-1a-tz #phase-2a-tz the paper https://www.researchgate.net/publication/251470314_Psychometric_Principles_in_Student_Assessment 69 pages Provides a good overview on the connection between the construct (what we assume the students knows, can do) and the observable behavior present in the task, which is measured (assessed) by reference to the rubric.
